name: Schwirch
description:
Explore an abandoned factory in the middle of the night for no reason at all. Smack ghosts in the face before the beat the life out of you.

This was supposed to be uploaded for a Game Jam (cant renember which), but things got messy and i was not able to finish it in time. Im going to post it anyways cause im not a coward who leaves his projects behind.

I made a few levels and code this is as far as i got with the base mechanics in about 10 days, expect some bugs and some other stuff that might not be working properly.
